titles.title: A resolution to amend paragraph 4 of Rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/7/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide authority for Senators to serve on specified committees during the 103d Congress while continuing service on certain other committees.
